<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Antipaladin](/NPCs.aspx?ID=961)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

There is perhaps nothing more anathematic to peace than an antipaladin. Dedicated holy warriors to the darkest and foulest of deities, antipaladins work to fulfill the vile wishes of their evil masters. The zeal with which they implement the plans of dark gods makes them truly fearsome foes for anyone allied with the forces of good.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Villain_Antipaladin.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Antipaladin](/NPCs.aspx?ID=961)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 247</row>

**Perception** +10

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +10, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +12, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
[lesser cheetah's elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=86), [Greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21), [Half Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12), [Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (10)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 75

**Destructive Vengeance** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Trigger** An enemy within 15 feet damages the antipaladin; **Effect** The antipaladin increases the amount of damage they take by 2d6 and deals 2d6 damage to the triggering enemy, choosing evil or negative damage. In addition, the antipaladin deals 2 extra damage of the chosen type with their Strikes against the triggering creature until the end of the antipaladin's next turn.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
greataxe +15 ([Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d12+10 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +12 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+10 piercing

**Champion Devotion Spells** DC 20, 1 Focus Point
- **3rd**
[Touch of Corruption](/Spells.aspx?ID=654)

**Intimidating Strike** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The antipaladin makes a melee Strike. If they hit and deal damage, the target is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), or frightened 2 on a critical hit.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Servants Of Destruction</title>

Antipaladins are the polar opposite of [paladins](/Causes.aspx?ID=1): chaotic evil warriors devoted to destruction. Much like champions of good, they must follow a code. Their code exhorts evil and prohibits selfless acts. Antipaladins usually serve [Lamashtu](/Deities.aspx?ID=11), [Rovagug](/Deities.aspx?ID=15), or demon lords. Many antipaladins used to be champions of good and seek to destroy their former faiths.
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-198" />
name: Antipaladin
